posts.content: Creative now selling 'Samba Conversion' kits - Cashing in on the Samba's rarity? Increasing value of standard deluxes if converted? Reducing value of genuine Sambas? Doesn't the VIN tell you whether it's genuine or not?



Sent from my GT-I9300 using Tapatalk 2
This is nothing new, there are plenty of fake Sambas out there. People have been selling roof sections cut out of scrap buses for years.

Amazing effort to produce such a great product. Hats off to CE.

People have been reproducing/faking stuff for years. Most people will always want the original and pay more for it.

I'm not directing this comment at you Rueben, but if people don't know the difference between a real one and a fake one then perhaps they shouldn't really own one.
